description: Co-participation allows to model the relation between two objects that par ticipate in a same event (implicitly); n-ary participation allows to model par ticipation over different dimensions e.g., temporal, spatial, etc., as well as explicitly relate more than one object to the same event; object role, n-ary classiÔ¨Åcation are examples of CPs that can be composed with this CP.
name: The basic participation pattern, without temporal indexing
